com.clarkparsia.common.io.block
Class TextBlockWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      java.io.PrintWriter
          com.clarkparsia.common.io.block.BlockWriter
              com.clarkparsia.common.io.block.TextBlockWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public class TextBlockWriter
extends BlockWriter

Concrete implementation of BlockWriter for purely textual output like console output. It can probably be used for any kind of output where monospaced font is used.

This implementation simply counts the number of characters printed on one line and pads the next line with the same number of spaces.

Author:
Evren Sirin
